00021 typedef HANDLE pthread_mutex_t;

00026 // pthread macros from Kenric B. White
00027 // (some were modified by me (Douglas J. Kennard))
00028 #define pthread_mutex_lock(A) (WAIT_FAILED == \
00029                                WaitForSingleObject(*(A),INFINITE))//kbw,me
00030 #define pthread_mutex_unlock(A) (!ReleaseMutex( *(A) )) //kbw,me
00031 #define sem_wait(A) ((WaitForSingleObject( *(A), INFINITE)),0)//kbw,me
00032 #define sem_post(A) (!ReleaseSemaphore( *(A), 1, NULL))//kbw,me
00033 #define sem_init(A,B,C) (-1 * (NULL == \
00034                         ((*(A)) = (CreateSemaphore(NULL,(C),9999999,NULL)))))//kbw,me
00035 #define pthread_mutex_init(A,B) ((*(A) = (CreateMutex(NULL, FALSE, "A"))),0)//kbw,me
00036 
00037 // this may not work, I haven't tried it.  It may not even compile
00038 inline int pthread_create(pthread_t *thread, pthread_attr_t *attr,
00039         void *(*start_routine)(void *), void *arg){
00040   (*thread) = _beginthreadex(NULL, 0,
00041            (unsigned (__stdcall *)(void *))start_routine,
00042            arg, 0, NULL);
00043   if(0 == (*thread))
00044     return 1;
00045   return 0;
00046 }
00047 
00048 // this may not work, I haven't tried it.  It may not even compile
00049 inline int pthread_mutex_destroy(pthread_mutex_t mtx){
00050   return !(closehandle(mtx));
00051 }

00054 inline int getNumCPUs(){
00055   SYSTEM_INFO si;
00056   GetSystemInfo(&si);
00057   return si.dwNumberOfProcessors;
00058 }
